[artist](http://mattcrossley.deviantart.com/)
Out of curiosity, would you go Q or E max in this matchup?
I always go E first regardless of the match up I have since I can get it to a 3sec cool down sooner and that's awesome, then I go Q

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T03:17:03.735+0000)
>
> I always go E first regardless of the match up I have since I can get it to a 3sec cool down sooner and that's awesome, then I go Q

Isn't one supposed to W max after going E, for the dank CDR and more reliable burst?
Really depends, do you want more stuns or do you want more damage?

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T03:50:39.820+0000)
>
> Really depends, do you want more stuns or do you want more damage?

I mean, damage is king with Riv but you've already really shafted the damage you have by not q maxing right off the bat. 

Utility ends up much better and you can still deal out the pain by weaving between Q's and whatnaught with W max so it always made more sense to do that after and then Q last in such a case.    I dunno though, I think it probably would depend on playstyle yeah?

Going Q first always felt like you're being really cocky and arrogant, plus it's what people expect you to do, if you max E first you can absorb so much damage that you can just piss people off so much quicker, but to eac their wn I suppose.

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T03:58:34.214+0000)
>
> Going Q first always felt like you're being really cocky and arrogant, plus it's what people expect you to do, if you max E first you can absorb so much damage that you can just piss people off so much quicker, but to eac their wn I suppose.

Senpai how do you survive this meta?
Max CDR as fast as you can :P

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T04:13:38.257+0000)
>
> Max CDR as fast as you can :P

What is your prefered rush?   BC, DD, or are you more situational with it?   Or maybe you're a caulfields tiamat kinda person?
even if the enemy has no tanks {{item:3071}} is always a good choice and if I'm running crit Riven I get {{item:3142}} if not then I get {{item:3812}}

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a0000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T05:09:29.515+0000)
>
> even if the enemy has no tanks {{item:3071}} is always a good choice and if I'm running crit Riven I get {{item:3142}} if not then I get {{item:3812}}

Black cleaver is always gucci.     Do you rush essence on crit riven for the CDR or do you feel the passive would be a waste?

Speaking of wastes, you tried iceborne Riven with Cleaver?   It's OP OP

The Mana Iceborn gives is useless on Riven i'd take Trinity Force if it offered more attack and didn't have mana I don't like taking an item and wasting it's stats for any champion, and i'd take Essence if it offered a little life steal I take 14% Crit Runes when I run Crit Riven so all I need is the IE most other Crit items on Riven kinda stink because they don't deal enough Damage and Attack speed on Riven isn't the greatest all you need for Attack speed is Ghost blade

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-04-06T08:03:36.864+0000)
>
> I do Crit Riven just for fun, but it does work if your willing to invest in crit runes

I invested in a full rune page for alkali, as anyone knows it costs an arm and a leg.

My body is ready.
I do Crit Riven just for fun, but it does work if your willing to invest in crit runes

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorKarr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=zYQF9dyk,comment-id=000a000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-06T06:06:21.662+0000)
>
> The Mana Iceborn gives is useless on Riven i'd take Trinity Force if it offered more attack and didn't have mana I don't like taking an item and wasting it's stats for any champion, and i'd take Essence if it offered a little life steal I take 14% Crit Runes when I run Crit Riven so all I need is the IE most other Crit items on Riven kinda stink because they don't deal enough Damage and Attack speed on Riven isn't the greatest all you need for Attack speed is Ghost blade

Ah ah, I was just curious.   I've seen some weird shit on /r Rivenmains

Do you just do crit Riven for funsies or are there any matchups you feel its really strong against?

The big problem with {{item:3071}} rush is it delays Riven's powerspikes for a long time and only gives 50 AD. My preferred build looks something like this:

{{item:3133}} > {{item:1333}} > {{item:3812}} > {{item:3077}} >{{item:3142}} > {{item:3074}} > {{item:3139}} > Defensive item if needed or armor pen.

Against a team with heavy tanks I just replace Ghostblade with Cleaver.
-----
Regarding E max, I almost never max it first unless I am already losing lane and need the extra CDR to survive in long fights. Usually I start Q then W to get an early kill using the Blue Cheese Strat before maxing Q then E.
---
Out of curiosity, what is your favorite combo?

*Reads the comment*

*Cries because Ghostblade no longer gives crit*

It used to be so much fun.

Depends if Raptorkarr can go 5/0 before MM gets {{item:3116}} 

Becuase after that Mordekaiser is basically unstoppable for melees.
Darius rekts Morde
Depends. Who has Shen on their team?

I've never seen Raptorkarr play so I have no idea how good a Riven player he is, but then again I've never seen Malicious play either. 

So I'm taking the biased route and voting for Riven.

Let us logic this out:

We have two possibilities for RaptorKarr:

Either they are a velociraptor, which died out millenia ago and thereby they are extinct and lose by default.

Or

They are any number of species of bird which prey on other birds. Following this logic, Malicious Metal is not a bird, and therefore Raptor would not hunt Metal while Metal can be any number of high-speed projectiles meant to shoot down birds.

Therefore, in all cases, Malicious Metal would win.  The science is flawless.

Or i'm this https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/4/46/Lockheed_Martin_F-22A_Raptor_JSOH.jpg

or this https://www.videogamesartwork.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_node/public/images/image/1381161464/decimal_mech_m8h3_raptor.jpg?itok=4MKT4CLr

Ah, but here's the problem with that:

Both are made out of metal alloys, which Metal has dominion over. He would be able to attack from the inside.

Unfortunately, the only way to win is if you changed your name to RustLord.

Both are also made to kill Metal things

what if i'm this
http://orig00.deviantart.net/c747/f/2014/273/4/d/xeno_raptor_by_heretictemplar-d8161ei.jpg

That is not made to kill metal things and is killed by metal things. And if Malicious Metal is you as you are a metal Raptor, then you must destroy yourself to destroy him. Then it must be decided by Smash Bros. rules who wins by who dies first.

The science is simply flawless. SCIENCE. SCIEEEEEEEEEENCE.
Mord wins easy so long as he doesn't let riven cheese him before 5
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4Vd1JP56G2w/hqdefault.jpg
lol RIP RaptorKarr's hopes and dreams

RaptorKarr got smitten

Ouch.

Too much respect for Malicious to vote against him.

{{champion:82}} hue hue hue...
I don't think I've ever lost to Riven as Morde. I've even started rushing {{item:3041}} anytime I'm leaning against a Riven, just because I know it'll be fully stacked.
even with her strength, I'm pretty sure that riven would have to work to stay upright if morde was leaning on her

This needs to actually happen and we need a replay file for it upvote if you agree
1v1, summoners rift, no bots, no one else
Here's the thing MM is EUW i'm NA that's not happening and I wouldn't agree to it anyway :/

is it because morde tends to be able to fight riven? I've only laned with mordekaiser one time since the rework (the thing terrifies me to play him anymore and I'm still popping around trying roles) and she tried to all in me level 1, she died because I started q thinking "she's so going to all in me" then she ended up stuck under tower getting poked forever because I'm dumb and can't manage the wave properly.


or is it because you wouldn't want to bring harm to someone you've already wronged by spying on and revealing her identity.

(although seriously how is the riven vs morde matchup?)
No it's because I think forced 1v1's are stupid :/

Not to be stereotypical but I really enjoy The Shy combo.    The instantaneous deletion is very satisfying.      

Of course I still consider myself a learner and unfortunately frequently perform my combos very sloppily.
As much as I like RaptorKarr, Mordekaiser would probably beat Riven in a 1v1.
tbh Morde kinda wrecks Riven as far as I've seen, despite being a big Riven fan, I can admit my losses.
